answers.answer: Hay I did the 1hr. test wasnt badd....&then the next week had to do the 3hr. It was almost unbearable,but I got thru it. Idid test positive 4 gestational diabetes,but im getting thru that too. This is now day 2 of pricking my finger 4× a day while keeping track of my glucose & honestly its so much easier than I thought.....no matter whAt ur result is....hang in dere u can do it gurly
Good luck!! The 3 hour does suck... And the diabetes is no picnic, but it's worth it for the little ones! Prayers that you passed :)

Thanks guys. I'm a little worried about the diet I could get put on. I'm a very picky eater, and I have a feeling most of what ever I'm told I should eat, I won't. Lol. This waiting to find out how I did *****. Lol.
I go for my 1 hour next week. Incredibly nervous... Im overweight and my fiance has diabetes. Not excited! The only thing that comforts me is that I'll have his help and know how for dealing with it.

question: I had my one hour gestational diabetes test today.  Please think good thoughts that I passed it. I really don't want to have to do the 3 hr test. The stuff they gave me wasnt bad at all. Not even really overly sweet. Made wiggle worm do a lot of kicking. Lol.
title: 1hr gestational diabetes test
